courseSection0.text3: CIS4361 - Secure Operating Systems and Administration (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
CNT4703C - Design and Implementation of Computer Communication Networks (3)
CNT4704 - Analysis of Computer Communication Networks (3)
EEL4781 - Computer Communication Networks (3)
courseSection1.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
CIS4615 - Secure Software Development and Assurance (3)
CIS4940C - Topics in Cybersecurity (3)
EEE4346C - Hardware Security and Trusted Circuit Design (3)

li.A minimum grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better: A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements
  A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor
